queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:admin}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:admin}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:admin}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:admin}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:edit}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:edit}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:view}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{appscode:scanner:view}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.volumeMounts.name={{serving-cert}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-db}}.volumeMounts.name={{storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kine}}.volumeMounts.name={{storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.volumeMounts.name={{storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kine}}.volumeMounts.name={{etcd-cert}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.volumeMounts.name={{etcd-cert}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cacher}}.volumeMounts.name={{serving-cert}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kine}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cacher}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-db}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{starter}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{starter}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cacher}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-scanner.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=release-name-scanner.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-scanner.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=release-name-scanner.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.rules[6] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.rules[6] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kine}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

queries.description: A Service Account token is shared between workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
'spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kine has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=app has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=starter has resources defined
spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.containers.name=cacher has limits defined
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=init-db has limits defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.containers.name=cacher.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=app.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=starter should have resources defined

queries.description: Cronjobs must have a configured deadline, which means the attribute 'startingDeadlineSeconds' must be defined

files.expected_value: spec.startingDeadlineSeconds should be defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{app}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-db}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init-db}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{starter}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{starter}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kine}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kine}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cacher}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.spec.jobTemplate.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cacher}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kine}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kine}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{starter}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{starter}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init-db}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init-db}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cacher}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cacher}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{app}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{app}}

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.apiVersion of CronJob should be {{batch/v1}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}}.apiVersion of CronJob  is deprecated and is {{batch/v1beta1}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-trivydb-cacher}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner-init-trivydb-cache}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: A StatefulSet requests volume storage.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-scanner}}.spec.volumeClaimTemplates.spec.resources.requests.storage should not be set
